articles.description: The SAT, by a 2:1 majority, has dismissed RIL’s appeal challenging a March 2017 order directing disgorgement of Rs 447.27 crore.

articles.title: How the Chinese-owned Gland Pharma transformed from a small-time Heparin maker to complex injectable... - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: Chinese promoters of company to dilute shares in what is going to be India’s biggest IPO. Srinivas Sadu, MD, tells Moneycontrol that the one big advantage of Gland is uniform quality standards, across geographies.
articles.content: In what is considered to be the biggest initial public offering (IPO) by a pharmaceutical firm in India, Gland Pharma's Chinese promoters Fosun Pharma and other shareholders will be offering 43.2 mil… [+10632 chars]

articles.author: ET Now
articles.title: Working to bring down cost-to-income ratio to below 50%, says new SBI boss - Economic Times
articles.description: I will try and see if we can shore up our revenue streams and optimise the operations and bring down the cost to income ratio to below 50, says Dinesh Kumar Khara.
articles.content: Entities will have to ensure that their balance sheets remain strong so they can withstand the uncertainty risks, says Dinesh Kumar Khara, Chairman, SBI.How has life changed for you in the last coupl… [+8718 chars]
